plot: When two quirky girls go on a journey to discover the meaning of life, their experience of time and space is turned upside down in this farcical tale.
title: Beautiful Daydreams
plot_es: When two quirky girls go on a journey to discover the meaning of life, their experience of time and space is turned upside down in this farcical tale.
plot_en: When two quirky girls go on a journey to discover the meaning of life, their experience of time and space is turned upside down in this farcical tale.
